ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: In this work several thousands of single experiments acquired over the past decade are included. This large amount of data originates from more than 30 undergraduate/masters theses and seven Ph.D. theses. Therefore, a very large group of people contributed to the success of this work—anybody who added a little piece of work is acknowledged. Funding of several research projects is acknowledged by Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft, Bundesministerium für Bildung und Forschung via Projektträger Jülich, Bundesministerium für Wirtschaft via Arbeitsgemeinschaft industrieller Forschungsvereinigungen, Deutscher Akademischer Austauschdienst. Beyond that, we acknowledge financial support by Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft and Universität Rostock within the funding program Open Access Publishing.
